abilities.name: Fear Aura.
abilities.description: Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend must make a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw, unless the pit fiend is incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the pit fiend's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The pit fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
abilities.description: The pit fiend's weapon attacks are magical.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The pit fiend's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 21). The pit fiend can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, fireball
3/day each: hold monster, wall of fire
